comments.body: this was the reason we made this original change... to make the error messages look nicer. but i guess we can not differentiate between `true | false` and `boolean` in any meaningful manner.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +16,20 @@var numStrBoolTuple: [number, string, boolean] = [5, "foo", true];
>numStrBoolTuple : [number, string, boolean]
>[5, "foo", true] : [number, string, true]
>5 : 5
>"foo" : "foo"
